typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountryLookup
RemovingNulls split(population <= '1000' && population >= '200000',
	population <= '200001' && population >= '1000000',
	population >= '1000001',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(LessPopulationDensity, ModeratePopulationDensity, HighPopulationDensity)
CountryLookup aggregate(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		continent,
		population),
	each(match(name!='country'&&name!='country_code_2_digit'&&name!='country_code_3_digit'&&name!='continent'&&name!='population'), $$ = first($$))) ~> RemovingDuplicates
RemovingDuplicates filter(not(isNull(country) || isNull(country_code_2_digit) || isNull(country_code_3_digit) || isNull(continent) || isNull(population))) ~> RemovingNulls
ConditionalSplit@LessPopulationDensity sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LessPopulationDensity
ConditionalSplit@HighPopulationDensity sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HighPopulationDensity
ConditionalSplit@ModeratePopulationDensity sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ModeratePopulationDensity
